response.overview: Johnny Sins is in trouble with his wife and he doesn't even know why! It's too bad he can't read women's minds. . . except, when Johnny, wakes up the next morning, he finds he can do just that. When Johnny's with has some friends over (including sexy blond Cali Carter), Johnny can tell what they're all thinking. Cali has some very horny thoughts directed to Mr. Sins, so he finds an excuse to bring her up to the bedroom and show off his cock. Cali is surprised by Johnny's brazenness, but totally into it. Johnny gives his wife's friend a mind-blowing fuck, ending with a big facial.
response.title: Her Slutty Thoughts
